title: Manage Security for a VIP Visit
description: A foreign dignitary is visiting. An operator must monitor their motorcade's route and ensure its security.

tasks.description: Load the VIP's pre-planned motorcade route into the monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inputs the route into the system.

tasks.description: Dedicate a set of traffic and security cameras along the route to a special 'VIP Watch' dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a custom monitoring view for the event.

tasks.description: Monitor the live feeds during the motorcade, reporting any suspicious activity (e.g., drones, unauthorized vehicles) to police.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides real-time situational awareness to the security detail.
